about_the_game:
The system here is quite familiar (maybe nostalgic),

by mixing different types of gunpowder, a new kind is created.

When gunpowder is combined with the Reloading Tool, an amount of ammunition is created

To activate the next level you need to put in slots A, B, and C the right items.

Each item has a value, or more precisely a water flow level.

short_description: Two catastrophic events—a global internet collapse and a solar storm—plunged the world into darkness. Master the art of mixing gunpowder and crafting ammo to solve puzzles, stabilize the dam, and uncover secrets in this shattered world. Fight to restore light and hope.
